prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a small green lizard with a friendly expression and big eyes.
Imagine a playful grass-type Pokemon that can jump high and blend into its forest surroundings.
Design a Pokemon that uses its tail for balance while climbing trees in a lush environment.
Show me a tiny bipedal Pokemon that has a vibrant green body and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that has a pink belly and bright yellow eyes, perfect for a starter in a new region.
Make a unique creature inspired by reptiles that thrives in grasslands and possesses agile movements.
Give me an adorable Pokemon that loves to explore urban areas while remaining connected to nature.
